title: Hatchy
author: Hatchy
content: My country people, as we all don dey expect the day wey our president Buhari administration go hand over to Tinibu finally na tomorrow and dey pray make every thing go peacefully. As today na Sunday, make we all put our country for our prayer oo and let's not forget that if Nigeria better tomorrow na for all of us. We still never know watin Tinibu don plan wait for the country, but any how e be we go still survive. Watin una think, this new president watin una dey expect from am?https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.vanguardngr.com/2023/03/buharill-handover-peacefully-to-tinubu-on-may-29-fg-assures/amp/

comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: Hatchy on May 28, 2023, 08:59:52 AM My country people, as we all don dey expect the day wey our president Buhari administration go hand over to Tinibu finally na tomorrow and dey pray make every thing go peacefully. As today na Sunday, make we all put our country for our prayer oo and let's not forget that if Nigeria better tomorrow na for all of us. We still never know watin Tinibu don plan wait for the country, but any how e be we go still survive. Watin una think, this new president watin una dey expect from am?Today being the 29th of May is a bad day for some people while for some other it is a good day and for some others they do give a flying f**k. That being said, we must not loose hope because our destinies are not tied to the president. We must forge ahead with faith and courage and try to make our life worthwhile while at it. We must know that just as PMB bowed out yesterday from ASO rock if the judiciary doesn't do the right thing and BAT remains in power, after 4 years he'll still bow out. Nobody will rule forever. Love and Light my people.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on May 29, 2023, 12:39:48 PMToday being the 29th of May is a bad day for some people while for some other it is a good day and for some others they do give a flying f**k. That being said, we must not loose hope because our destinies are not tied to the president. We must forge ahead with faith and courage and try to make our life worthwhile while at it. We must know that just as PMB bowed out yesterday from ASO rock if the judiciary doesn't do the right thing and BAT remains in power, after 4 years he'll still bow out. Nobody will rule forever. Love and Light my people. Omo.. Truth be told, still hoping on the case of the obedient movement to have head is just like waiting for a dead rabbit to come back to live oh, because as the whole matter don be like this now, lets just accept our faith and pray God uses president "Bola Admed Tinubu" for the betterment of the entire nation, because just as we been all dey pray make ex-president Buhari to die on seat and yet he completed his 8yrs today in health of mind & body, I bet you, na the same way "Bola Tinubu" go run am & yet nothing go happen, because the worst thing wey go fit happen na to dey postpone court cases till the first 4yrs elapses. So let's just pray our new president surprises us by doing far beyond our expectations. Na only wetin I get to talk be that oh, bcos just as the inauguration went peacefully today, I bet you na so him tenure go end peacefully.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Even as most of us no accept the new presido, eh don enter be say eh don enter, watin we need dy hope on now nah, since eh be say dem don use their power enter d seat or power, make dem still try small they do small small tinx way go favor the countri nah just my own, bcuz eh go hard for us 2 still they oppose d government wen we no say d government no even too care about us way wan fight against dem, make dem just try do anything way dem no say dem fit do way go help us small for the countri, make dem open boarder if possible make things fit dy come in they go out of the countri freely eh go help reduce price of things small. Nah just mi own since we don try to vote who will choose eh no work... Make dem try use who dem choose make the country work small.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: I must say this is going to be a long term for Nigeria's again in terms of positive governance, many Nigerian youth actually fought to have a new hope and a new Nigerian but as a result of a very corrupt election that actually produce hola Ahmed tinubu I am actually short of words but I have lost my hope in this country.Firstly during his inauguration he couldn't work properly because of his age and ill health yet again the helm of affairs of Nigerian is handed over to a sick president but this time around to some one with low knowledge capacity, it's really going to be long term for Nigeria.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: I wonder wetin the new government wan do wey the past no do. Nah removal of subsidy? Or wetin? All we go do nah to continue in our hustle becos e no gud to carry this incoming regime get hope, since him no fit string intelligent words together and they even pass questions give him assistant to answer for am, I doubt him go fit help the youths. I just hope say by the time e tenure finish, we go still get contri to call our own.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on May 31, 2023, 02:56:52 PMI wonder wetin the new government wan do wey the past no do. Nah removal of subsidy? Or wetin? All we go do nah to continue in our hustle becos e no gud to carry this incoming regime get hope, since him no fit string intelligent words together and they even pass questions give him assistant to answer for am, I doubt him go fit help the youths. I just hope say by the time e tenure finish, we go still get contri to call our own.Na true talk you just yan so oh, but you never can tell this new administration fit shock many of us oh, by doing far better than the previous, so as to try to impress the masses since they know between themselves that the majority didn't vote for them, and as such go wan try to impress so that we fit vote for them for second tenure. However, there is one Facebook post I came across talking about how Nigeria have succeeded in electing the first female president (i.e Mrs. Oluremi Tinubu) the wife of the current president of Nigeria who is still very vibrant &  healthy, and claimed that she is the one going to be in charge of decision making for the country due to her husband's old age & health challenges. But I don't know how true the source of this statement likely to be.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milfI wonder wetin the new government wan do wey the past no do. Nah removal of subsidy? Or wetin? All we go do nah to continue in our hustle becos e no gud to carry this incoming regime get hope, since him no fit string intelligent words together and they even pass questions give him assistant to answer for am, I doubt him go fit help the youths. I just hope say by the time e tenure finish, we go still get contri to call our own.Bro u really hit the point, let us concentrate on ur hustle, so that this issues of politics will not bring something that will shake ur unity in dis forum. I have faith that one day Naija go better like other developed countries, so dat other countries citizens will be coming to ur country to receive fresh air like the way some of ur big men and women are going to other countries to spend ur money anyhow. We pray for peace for dis new government and let us join d new government with good comment so that other countries will not be laughing at us in dis Bitcointalk.

comments.author: SmartCharpa
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoHeadlineNews on May 31, 2023, 04:10:04 PMNa true talk you just yan so oh, but you never can tell this new administration fit shock many of us oh, by doing far better than the previous,The thing wey you be want talk make sense Sha me sef dey think am tinubu tenure fit better pass but this fuel subsidy matter wey dey ground now majority of our country now dey fear demo never know waiting the man go do yet about the fuel price seeas fuel just dey scars for this country na anytime we go dey see a lot of shege e never tey wey we finish suffering from naira note we don dey face another challenges again.Make we just dey pray say na better thing him dey plan do about this challenge we are facing now, make him regime better pass buhari own.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: The future or the country does not lie in the hands of the politicians, they are just ordinary human being like us who can make mistakes and fail their responsibilities atimes, we have to live in corperation without depending on the government to tell us what's right to do and what not to do, we need to live at peace with all men, support the government towards creating a better living, the new government is now left to deliver upto task.
